author: rivals.com
title: Divaad Wilson Divaad Wilson ‚Äôs offer list has grown quickly
text:
Divaad Wilson Divaad Wilson ‚Äôs offer list has grown quickly in recent weeks. And just when it seemed he would stack a few dozen offers before his senior season, he put an end to his recruitment.
As it turns out, Florida was the offer for which the young cornerback was waiting. He announced his quick decision with a tweet
Blessed to say that I'm Committed to the Florida Gators! üêäüêä #AllBite18 @UFRC_JH @RLS2294 @CoachMcElwain pic.twitter.com/zwDikVcQ9i
‚Äî Divaad Wilson¬Æ (@NikemanNewt) February 4, 2017 The decision, it seems, was designed to send a message. According to Wilson, he‚Äôs a player that knows what he wants. He saw his recent offer from UF as a opportunity and wasted no time in seizing it.
I was waiting for [a Florida offer], but I wasn't rushing it,‚Äù Wilson said. ‚ÄúIt's a big opportunity that I can't pass on.
I had to jump on board early to let coach know i'm not playing.
Wilson visited Florida for the Gators‚Äô game against South Carolina this fall and was further sold on the program at that juncture.
‚ÄúIt was a great atmosphere up there,‚Äù Wilson said.
Wilson attends Miami Northwestern High School. He was one of the most impressive prospects at South Florida Express tryouts a week ago.
